title: New update ruined the game.
text: Used to be a terrific game that I spent hours playing and plenty of money on. Then they took away the board reset feature. Now levels are impossible and boosters you paid for can start in an impossible and pointless place on the board and you can’t reset them. Deleted and cured of my addiction!

title: Again!! Annoyed with latest update!!!
text:
DECEMBER 5, 2019

Just started playing Candy Crush a few weeks ago but was told by friends that there had been some improvements and should try again!  I did and agreed that it was improved.  Been sick so not played for a week & played today and now I find that I cannot look at a level without losing my latest upgrade on boosters!!  Cannot believe that they have changed that!  I like to look to see what the level requirements are before selecting from my boosters!  It is very irritating that this has been changed after years of it not being a loss of boosters if I exit! 

I updated and now I am losing lives, 20 lives so far, every time it crashes which is frequently!!!  Does anyone test before releasing updates?

PREVIOUS UPDATE:  Liked the game but has too many quirks!  Lose friend emails, sending requests for lives touch one friend and get multiple due to sensitivity.  Been stuck this level for three weeks but do not receive the 3 extra shots but am constantly prompted to send for other friends stuck.  Then hear from friends this new feature does not work!  No surprise considering all the other issues!  I am with the others on this, way too many pleasurable games to play out there, why deal with the frustration!  Delete!

title: Taking away being able to reset board
text: Agreed with others on here latest update boo! It was nice being able to reset the board if we hadn’t made a move yet this new updates a no go. That feature was one reason I liked candy crush please bring it back

title: Disappointed
text: I have been playing Candy Crush for years and am disappointed with the developers that they would take away the option to reset the game. Why would they care if you reset the board?! It’s bad enough that most levels once you get higher up, I’m on level 3623, can’t be won without a booster now I can’t reset the board if I don’t like it! Are they really that greedy?

title: Wow
text:
Y’all are trash for this update. Take a life AND pre-selected boosters ⁉️⁉️ 
Im out.✌🏾

title: Crashes after update
text: Being able to reset without losing a life or your boosters is the only thing that made the last of these levels even have the potential to be doable. The latest update where you took that away means that now it’s just going to be very nearly impossible to pass a level. Please reverse this update

title: Terrible update
text: This update removes the only method for passing some of the extremely difficult levels. Prepare to get stuck indefinitely.

title: Fun but too hard
text: I love the game it’s super enjoyable but some of the levels are so hard that it’s not worth having the game anymore. I was on the same level for over a month at some point.

title: Annoying
text: Disappointed. Mad with this update. You made it so if we start a level and not start it and decide to exit it takes a life. Goodbye candy crush

title: What a load of BS
text: We can no longer reset a level w/o losing a life. I like passing the time playing this game but there is no point in playing something that just pisses me off. I’m deleting the app F* IT🖕🏻

title: Become worst game
text: Each update make you hate the game more and more I don’t know why stop every good thing in the game i reach 4125 level 👎🏼

title: No more backing out??
text: You can no longer exit a level before moving without losing a life, are you kidding? Why would you change that and take away one of the things that gives us a tiny bit of control. That’s a deal breaker for me.

title: Throwing in the towel
text: Add me to the list of those deleting this game because of King company removing the ability to back out of a level without penalty. As soon as I’m done writing this, deleting the app. Horrible update!  This is coming from a long time software engineer who works closely with customers on feature requests for IT.  Listen to your customers!

title: New update.?!!!
text: What is going on with the new update?! I can’t exit a game without losing a life before I start anymore? When did this happen and why. Won’t be playing until this is fixed 🙄

title: DONE
text: Taking back my life.  Which I don’t have to wait for your sick sense of humor to refill.

title: New update fail.
text: New update is absolutely horrible. This is the last time I ever play. And the bonus wheel is a complete joke, I have been playing, sad to admit, but nearly everyday for YEARS, and I have never once hit the jackpot.
Nice game

title: No Reset??
text: Thanks for taking away the last redeemable thing about this game. Had some semblance of hope for passing a hard board. Boooooo

title: WAS a great game. Since the update, it’s crap!
text: You can no longer use the STRATEGY of resetting a board before making any moves. Now it costs you a life. Completely BS and makes the game impossible. King is greedy and trying to squeeze even more money from their players by making us purchase more lives and boosters than we already do! King should see by the online forums and complaints that NO ONE is happy about your so called “fix” and lots of us are now abandoning the game. Good job candy crush! 😡🤬👎👎👎👎👎👎👎

title: Necesita un look nuevo.

title: Latest update is a deal breaker
text: Worst update ever! It was a very important feature to be able to quit without losing a life and losing the boosters until the boosters are in preferable position. Especially for hard levels. Now that’s taken away...This is a deal breaker. I will not play this game anymore until this feature is back. Waste of time and money.

title: LET US HAVE OUR RESET FUNCTION BACK!

text: Please give back the option to end the level with out losing a life. This is my absolutely favorite game and now you’ve made it so difficult for me to play! Please

title: Change it back
text: Today I stoped being able to reset a level without losing a life. Stop making it more frustrating to play. I’m about to quit playing.  Resetting doesn’t make it easy to win. It just keeps you from wasting a life when you know you can win a board.

title: Screw it
text: Thank you for screwing up the game to be as horrible as soda saga. God forbid we back out and get a new layout. I’ve never spent a dime on your game since I started playing again a few months back... I won’t spend a dime. Take your game and shove it

title: Super Crush
text: Don’t expect to hit the jackpot on the daily spin.  It doesn’t happen.  Been playing daily for years.  Very disappointing!

title: Level 5876
text: I have been playing Candy crush for years now sadly the past year or so has been horrible. Levels are extremely difficult to pass ((including 5876 I’ve been here for days now)) you either need loads of boosters to pass or a lucky board. The one good thing we have was being able to leave the game before you made a move that which allowed us to rest the level and now you have gone and taken that away form us... why? I use to love this game. I looked forward to it and now I dread opening it up. This Game causes nothing but stress and aggravation. Maybe it’s truly time to walk away from this mess you have created.  You have taken all the fun away... are you proud of yourselves? And yes I have spent real money on this game. Thanks for nothing

title: Why did you remove unlimited shuffling
text: Fun game until most recent update and now if you click to play a level and exit without making any moves you lose a life.  UNACCEPTABLE CHANGE IT BACK

title: Fun game
text: Great game

title: Aggravating fun...
text: Fun game overall but the free spin wheel with the "jackpot" spot is a joke. Been playing for years but everytime I spin it gets more aggravating since NO ONE LANDS ON IT!!

title: Let me exit a level before it starts!!!
text:
please bring back the ability to exit a level before you start or make any moves without losing a life. (Unless it’s a timed level- I get it the times already started). There’s reasons we need to exit before starting- one being forgetting to click or un-click a booster. Two- sometimes YOU the app maker trick us into opening the level we just finished, and now because we can’t exit without losing a life- you better pray you’ll pass it again (unlikely in the 5,000’s!!) so you don’t lose that life and whatever boosters you’ve scraped together (robot body parts, space ships, or the current one- Christmas stocking). And God forbid you accidentally click on a past level...
Seems like just more of the same: y’all finding ways to make more money... but listen... this “update” will likely cause this years and years loyal player (who’s spent a great amount of money on bars and boosters!), to call it quits. You already make it impossible to pass these advanced levels unless you spend money for more moves or boosters. Let us have this. THANKS 🙏🏼

title: Update removes opt-out option on bad boards
text: Been playing this game for FIVE YEARS. Most helpful thing to keep me playing was the long-standing option to opt out of a level WITHOUT PENALTY if the board looked crappy. Now you’re stuck playing what it gives you; if you want a new board, you lose a life. Greedy

title: Can’t reset
text: Ridiculous the new update now won’t let you reset a level without losing a life. I deleted this for over a year and redownloaded it a few weeks ago, I was enjoying it till now with how they changed you can’t reset a level. Deleting again till this changes. Sad for king too because I would spend money every now and then. Their loss

title: Boosters
text: I am on level 4602. I haven’t had boosters in almost a week. I’ve earned them, but when I click to play, the boosters aren’t available. Please fix it and give me back my boosters and I’ll give you back your 2 stars.

title: Candy crush
text: Every time I go lives my friends send me the heart in the upper left Conner shows I have zero. It’s getting. To be very annoying can the game makers please fix The propblem ASAP thank you..

title: Tantalizingly delicious game, so come on and taste the fun!
text: You can taste the fun!

title: Waste of time
text: I was stuck on an level a friend told me to buy some lives so I did ! I finally won the level! I’m stuck again ! My friend is also stuck on a level, neither of us are eligible for a free spin! The only help is to buy lives! I have no intentions on buying lives just to win a level! I might occasionally buy lives but it should not be the expectation that it has become! My friend and I have watched the pattern and if you buy lives you will win the level! If this continues I will delete this game! There is no reason to be stuck on a level for days! Without help except pay! No video to watch nor a chance to spin for long periods of time!

title: passes time
text:
nice game to play when bored. 
although, i’ve been playing this game for 8 years. i’ve never won the jackpot on the booster wheel. some levels are repeated. and on the levels where the objective is to get the fruit down OR collect the keys to unlock gels/fruits, the keys or fruits are released when there’s less than 5 moves left!? doesn’t make sense when i need to get 5 fruits in less than 5 turns but i don’t see the first fruit until the last two moves. 
seems like we get ripped off a lot with this game. 
upside- i like the free boosters and extra videos to earn more boosters or chances to earn moves.
